name: The Sky Castle
description:
The Sky Castle is one-button platformer that take you on an adventure on the floating castle to the sky.

Survive the collapsing castle platforms and jump higher into the skies. Just tap to jump off the walls and over dangerous obstacles that are in your way. Try not to fall into the abyss! How far up can you go towards the Sky Castle?


SKY CASTLE FEATURES:
• Endless addictive gameplay
• Over 25 unlockable characters
• One-button gameplay
• Beautiful graphics
